mapper.insert: insert into ercode_group_join(is_destroy, is_change, is_sewage, is_drifter, device_status, interest_type, score, suggest, user_name, phone, file_path, create_time) values(#{isdestroy},#{ischange},#{issewage},#{isdrifter},#{devicestatus},#{interesttype},#{score},#{suggest}, #{username},#{phone},#{filepath},#{createtime})
